reviewText:
I am 35 and I am a very active person, this DVD has great music, much slower movement, it only make me felling asleep. haha.
I think for elder people or someone has really bad problem on their back,
this one will be great to start with. but it is not for me.
If you like a workout video that flows and works - this is not for you.  good for beginners who knows nothing about pilates.
